releases.title: API rate limiting, improved FilterHandler, non-root Docker usage

features.title: API rate limits
features.description: Every handler supports rate-limiting via the ratelimit config

features.title: Improved FilterHandler
features.description: FilterHandler can numerical column ranges and process filters in-memory

features.title: Non-root Docker usage
features.description: Gramex Docker builds allow installing npm packages as a non-root user

releases.title: DriveHandler post-processing, FilterHandler hierarchies, Secure Docker build

features.title: DriveHandler post-processing
features.description: DriveHandler can process a file after uploading, e.g. unzip it or test it

features.title: FilterHandler hierarchies
features.description: FilterHandler can return unique values across multiple columns like hierarchies

features.title: Secure Docker build
features.description: Gramex Docker builds are built on Alpine Linux and are free of known vulnerabilities on release

releases.title: ML Predictor, FormHandler date comparisons, Deprecate old UI libraries

features.title: MLPredictor
features.description: Runs ML models on dynamic datasets and render a FormHandler-like interface.

features.title: FormHandler date comparison
features.description: FormHandler parses date columns irrespective of input format

features.title: Deprecate old UI libraries
features.description: Applications should avoid using UI libraries from /ui/ and npm install their own

releases.title: Named Entity Recognition, distributed OTPs, slim Docker build

features.title: Named Entity Recognition
features.description: Infer names, locations, etc from any given text as an API.

features.title: Distributed OTP and API keys
features.description: OTPs and API keys can be stored in a remote database and shared across Gramex servers

features.title: Slim Docker build
features.description: The gramener/gramex-base image provides a Python-only build at half the size

releases.title: Revoke API keys, set session cookie paths, and Bootstrap 5 support

features.title: Revoke API keys and OTPs
features.description: Developers can manage and cancel API keys and one time passwords.

features.title: Session cookie path
features.description: Gramex apps can restrict cookies to specific paths and reduce cookie leakage.

features.title: Bootstrap 5 support in G1
features.description: Bootstrap 5 components in G1, like FormHandler work with Bootstrap 4 and Bootstrap 5.

releases.title: Distributed logging, schema caching, computed variables

features.title: Distributed Logging
features.description: LogViewer can aggregate data into a distributed database like MySQL.

features.title: Better table schema caching
features.description: If one instance changes a database table structure, all other instances re-use it.

features.title: Better computed variables
features.description: If a computed variable fails, Gramex uses the default instead of crashing.

releases.title: Multiple default filenames, Relative opens in templates, Distributed OTP

features.title: FileHandler supports multiple default filenames
features.description: If a directory has an `index.html` or `README.md`, one can act as a fallback.

features.title: Templates can open relative paths
features.description: `gramex.cache.open(path, rel=True)` inside a Tornado template opens path relative to template.

features.title: OTPs and API keys work on multi-server setups
features.description: The `otp:` service can use any distributed database to store OTPs and API keys.

releases.title: TypeScript, Time series models, CORS with auth

features.title: FileHandler supports TypeScript
features.description: FileHandler compiles any `.ts` file into JavaScript on the fly.

features.title: MLHandler supports time series models
features.description: MLHandler allows time series models.

features.title: Gramex makes cross-origin requests easy
features.description: Just add `cors: true` to the URL's `kwargs` to enable CORS.

releases.title: API keys, secure MongoDB access, session cookies

features.title: API keys support
features.description: API keys let users access services as if they were logged-in users.

features.title: Secure MongoDB access
features.description: It's now possible to connect securely to a MongoDB instance using TLS/SSL.

features.title: Session cookies
features.description: Gramex allows setting session cookies (that expire when the browser is closed, normally)

releases.title: Python 3.9 support, Faster scheduler, Tutorial videos

features.title: Python 3.9 support
features.description: Gramex runs on Python 3.7, 3.8, 3.9

features.title: Second-level scheduler
features.description: Scheduler runs at a 1-second granularity

features.title: ServiceNow connector
features.description: FormHandler can read from ServiceNow.

features.title: MongoDB write-back
features.description: FormHandler can write back to MongoDB databases.

releases.title: UIFactory events, InfluxDB support, Comicgen icons

features.title: Add and welcome users
features.description: Admin app lets administrators add new users, set their passwords, and send a welcome email.

features.title: Automated user roles
features.description: Admin app lets administrators add custom fields and roles to any user based on rules.

features.title: UIFactory inline scripts
features.description: UIFactory supports inline scripts, compresses components, and improves security.

releases.title: UIFactory events, InfluxDB support, Comicgen icons

features.title: UIFactory
features.description: UIFactory is now out of beta. Version 1.20 is packaged in Gramex 1.73, and features a simpler way to add events and create blocks.

features.title: Comicgen icons
features.description: Comicgen supports two new icon libraries that can be used as props. Microsoft’s FXEmoji with over 1,000 icons. Google’s Noto Emoji with over 2,000 icons.

features.title: FormHandler InfluxDB support
features.description: FormHandler can read from and write into InfluxDB, a time series database.
